description: Provide real-time and historical cryptocurrency data, market statistics, and exchange information to enhance your applications with up-to-date crypto insights. Enable advanced search and detailed coin comparisons to support informed decision-making. Simplify integration with easy API key configuration and ready-to-use prompts for market analysis.

apiKey.description: Your Coinranking API key (optional - can also configure via tool)

capabilities.name: configure_api_key
capabilities.description: Configure your Coinranking API key for this session. Get your key at https://account.coinranking.com/dashboard

capabilities.name: list_coins
capabilities.description: Get cryptocurrencies with prices, market caps, 24h volume, change %, rank, sparklines, and links - includes market totals

capabilities.name: get_coin
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive coin data: price, market cap, volume, supply details, all-time high, description, links, and social media

capabilities.name: get_price_history
capabilities.description: Get timestamped price history for charting - returns price points and change % over time periods (1h to 5y)

capabilities.name: search
capabilities.description: Search for coins, exchanges, or markets

capabilities.name: get_global_stats
capabilities.description: Get global market overview: total market cap, 24h volume, total coins/exchanges, Bitcoin dominance, and market trends

capabilities.name: list_exchanges
capabilities.description: Get exchanges with 24h volume, number of markets, rank, market share % - requires Pro API key

capabilities.name: get_reference_currencies
capabilities.description: Get currencies for displaying crypto prices - includes fiat (USD, EUR), cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH), and denominators (Satoshi, Wei)

capabilities.name: get_categories
capabilities.description: Get cryptocurrency categories with market analytics - includes market cap, volume, performance metrics, and coin counts for categories like DeFi, AI Agents, Layer-1, Meme Coins, etc.

capabilities.name: get_trending_coins
capabilities.description: Get top 10 trending cryptocurrencies based on searches, social mentions, and market activity

capabilities.name: get_coin_price
capabilities.description: Get just the current price of a coin - lightweight alternative to get_coin for price-only queries
